attributes.action: Make it mandatory for companies to publish their maternity leave policy publicly
attributes.additional_details: It is on the applicant to ask about maternity policies which can bias the interviewer against them. Making it a legal requirement would mean woman could make informed choices about employers without being negatively impacted.
attributes.background: Make it mandatory for all companies to post their maternity leave publicly.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/724858
